title: AWS Solutions Architect Exam Prep
headline: Prepare for the AWS Solutions Architect Certification examination with this free online course on Alison.com.
description: Are you looking to take your AWS certification to the next level? Or are you looking for better career opportunities within the AWS design and implementation industry? If you are, then you have come to the right place. This course on AWS systems architecture helps you prepare for the Solutions Architect exam in the most comprehensive manner possible. So don't waste time. Enroll now and open new horizons and professional opportunities today!

courseDescription:
In this Amazon Web Services (AWS) Solutions Architect crash course, Joe Holbrook, the CLO at Techcommanders, will be taking you on a comprehensive preparation journey to take your qualification to the next level. This course is your go-to guide for the Solutions Architect exam with AWS service demos, whiteboard discussions, examination tips and documentation links. We kick off with an overview of the solutions architect examination. Then we will discuss the various certifications, roles and prerequisites required. As part of the course preparation, we will discuss designing resilient architectures. We describe single and multi-tier architectural solutions along with best practices for design architecture. Is your cloud architecture lacking a planned approach? We will discuss preparing the AWS environment and virtual private clouds next.

The following section will examine the services offered by AWS to compute workloads such as EC2, Lambda and Elastic Beanstalk. The scalability and elasticity of these solutions are critical. Each section of the course provides some exam tips and techniques that will assist in applying this knowledge. In addition, we identify other essential AWS services such as elastic cache and other solutions for database domains such as Aurora and DynamoDB. We will demonstrate the use of all these applications and ensure the management of AWS resources orderly using CloudFormation. Next, we look for ways to keep your resources and deployments secure. When it comes to cloud computing, security is of paramount importance. Luckily, AWS provides numerous services that ensure data safety in the cloud. We analyze issues as simple as passwords and learn about restricting access to services that keep track and set off alarms.

AWS provides an array of services to ensure errors and faults are recognized early. We demonstrate these services, such as AWS config, S3 and data-in-transit. Ensuring that the AWS solutions are cost-effective is integral to designing and implementing resources. Luckily, AWS has a wide variety of cost optimization and billing management services within its framework. The AWS solutions architect certification can open many doors for individuals within the cloud-developing industry. These opportunities can lead to better growth and income streams for individuals in the short and long term. This online course on Alison.com will guide you every step of the way to achieve the AWS certification and your professional and personal goals. So enroll now and get started!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, the learner will examine the framework for well-architected solutions and deployments. The module starts off with an examination overview along with an introduction to the course instructor. Best practices for could solutions and tools available to ensure deployments are scalable and elastic shall be analyzed.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, the learner will be going through the key tools and services that can be used to design high-performance architectures. Identifying scalable solutions along with AWS design principles shall be discussed. The performance of cloud-based services will be examined. DevOps and AWS CloudWatch services shall also be discussed.
topics: Design High Performance Architectures - Learning Outcomes
Design High Performance Architectures - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, the learner will be going through certain aspects of security and best practices in the AWS framework. The various types of users within AWS shall be identified. The application of AWS Cloudtrail and Cloudwatch log trails shall be discussed. VPC flow logs, NACLS, and security groups along with S# permissions shall be described.
topics: Design Secure Applications and Architectures - Learning Outcomes
Admin Users, Trusted Advisors and CloudWatch
VPC Flow Logs, Security Hub and Bastion Host
S3 Permissions, IAM and Encryption Demo
Design Secure Applications and Architectures - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will be dealing with identifying the most cost-effective architecture design solutions with AWS. The learner will be going through several cost models available such as EC2, lambda, and dynamo along with numerous others. A discussion on AWS costing and pricing tools shall be carried out.
topics: Design Cost Optimized Architectures - Learning Outcomes
Cost-Effective Storage Solutions, S3 and EBS
LightSail, S3 Lifecycles and Billing Management
AWS Costing Plans, Pricing calculators and Savings
Design Cost Optimized Architectures - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
topics: AWS Systems Architect Exam Prep - Course assessment
